segments.text: I would like to purchase some meat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of meat would you like to get today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First off , I'm going to need a pound of ground beef .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A pound of ground beef is $ 2.48 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What else will you be needing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm also going to need three pounds of chicken breasts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The chicken breasts cost $ 4.05 per pound .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's the total price for the chicken ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I think that will be all for me today .
segments.speaker: S1
